name.description: The name of this DC/OS service.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to this instance.

mem.description: Memory to allocate to this instance.

bridge.description: Whether to use bridge networking mode for Docker container. By default, this is false and bridge mode networking is not used.

ssl.description: Whether or not to use custom SSL certificates. If selected, fetches SSL certificate and key from provided URIs.

enabled.description: If enabled, use provided URIs to fetch SSL certificate and key

ssl_key_path.description: URI to a key file. This can be hosted over HTTP(S) or a path to a local file.

ssl_cert_path.description: URI to a certificate file. This can be hosted over HTTP(S) or a path to a local file

name.description: The DC/OS service name of the Artifactory server to route requests to.

api-key.description: API key generated by the primary Artifactory. This is necessary for the artifactory-lb to authenticate against the primary Artifactory instance.
